mn15:6.1: Tatravuso, bhikkhuna attanava attanam evam anuminitabbam:
mn15:6.2: ‘yo khvayam puggalo papiccho, papikanam icchanam vasam gato, ayam me puggalo appiyo amanapo;
mn15:6.3: ahanceva kho panassam papiccho papikanam icchanam vasam gato, ahampassam paresam appiyo amanapo’ti.
mn15:6.4: Evam janantenavuso, bhikkhuna ‘na papiccho bhavissami, na papikanam icchanam vasam gato’ti cittam uppadetabbam.
mn15:6.5: ‘Yo khvayam puggalo attukkamsako paravambhi, ayam me puggalo appiyo amanapo;
mn15:6.6: ahanceva kho panassam attukkamsako paravambhi, ahampassam paresam appiyo amanapo’ti.
mn15:6.7: Evam janantenavuso, bhikkhuna ‘anattukkamsako bhavissami aparavambhi’ti cittam uppadetabbam.
mn15:6.8: ‘Yo khvayam puggalo kodhano kodhabhibhuto, ayam me puggalo appiyo amanapo.
mn15:6.9: Ahanceva kho panassam kodhano kodhabhibhuto, ahampassam paresam appiyo amanapo’ti.
mn15:6.10: Evam janantenavuso, bhikkhuna ‘na kodhano bhavissami na kodhabhibhuto’ti cittam uppadetabbam.
mn15:6.11: ‘Yo khvayam puggalo kodhano kodhahetu upanahi, ayam me puggalo appiyo amanapo;
mn15:6.12: ahanceva kho panassam kodhano kodhahetu upanahi, ahampassam paresam appiyo amanapo’ti.
mn15:6.13: Evam janantenavuso, bhikkhuna ‘na kodhano bhavissami na kodhahetu upanahi’ti cittam uppadetabbam.
mn15:6.14: ‘Yo khvayam puggalo kodhano kodhahetu abhisangi, ayam me puggalo appiyo amanapo;
mn15:6.15: ahanceva kho panassam kodhano kodhahetu abhisangi, ahampassam paresam appiyo amanapo’ti.
mn15:6.16: Evam janantenavuso, bhikkhuna ‘na kodhano bhavissami na kodhahetu abhisangi’ti cittam uppadetabbam.
mn15:6.17: ‘Yo khvayam puggalo kodhano kodhasamanta vacam nicchareta, ayam me puggalo appiyo amanapo;
mn15:6.18: ahanceva kho panassam kodhano kodhasamanta vacam nicchareta, ahampassam paresam appiyo amanapo’ti.
mn15:6.19: Evam janantenavuso, bhikkhuna ‘na kodhano bhavissami na kodhasamanta vacam niccharessami’ti cittam uppadetabbam.
mn15:6.20: ‘Yo khvayam puggalo codito codakena codakam patippharati, ayam me puggalo appiyo amanapo;
mn15:6.21: ahanceva kho pana codito codakena codakam patipphareyyam, ahampassam paresam appiyo amanapo’ti.
mn15:6.22: Evam janantenavuso, bhikkhuna ‘codito codakena codakam nappatippharissami’ti cittam uppadetabbam.
mn15:6.23: ‘Yo khvayam puggalo codito codakena codakam apasadeti, ayam me puggalo appiyo amanapo;
mn15:6.24: ahanceva kho pana codito codakena codakam apasadeyyam, ahampassam paresam appiyo amanapo’ti.
mn15:6.25: Evam janantenavuso, bhikkhuna ‘codito codakena codakam na apasadessami’ti cittam uppadetabbam.
mn15:6.26: ‘Yo khvayam puggalo codito codakena codakassa paccaropeti, ayam me puggalo appiyo amanapo;
mn15:6.27: ahanceva kho pana codito codakena codakassa paccaropeyyam, ahampassam paresam appiyo amanapo’ti.
mn15:6.28: Evam janantenavuso, bhikkhuna ‘codito codakena codakassa na paccaropessami’ti cittam uppadetabbam.
mn15:6.29: ‘Yo khvayam puggalo codito codakena annenannam paticarati, bahiddha katham apanameti, kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukaroti, ayam me puggalo appiyo amanapo;
mn15:6.30: ahanceva kho pana codito codakena annenannam paticareyyam, bahiddha katham apanameyyam, kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukareyyam, ahampassam paresam appiyo amanapo’ti.
mn15:6.31: Evam janantenavuso, bhikkhuna ‘codito codakena na annenannam paticarissami, na bahiddha katham apanamessami, na kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukarissami’ti cittam uppadetabbam.
mn15:6.32: ‘Yo khvayam puggalo codito codakena apadane na sampayati, ayam me puggalo appiyo amanapo;
mn15:6.33: ahanceva kho pana codito codakena apadane na sampayeyyam, ahampassam paresam appiyo amanapo’ti.
mn15:6.34: Evam janantenavuso, bhikkhuna ‘codito codakena apadane sampayissami’ti cittam uppadetabbam.
mn15:6.35: ‘Yo khvayam puggalo makkhi palasi, ayam me puggalo appiyo amanapo;
mn15:6.36: ahanceva kho panassam makkhi palasi, ahampassam paresam appiyo amanapo’ti.
mn15:6.37: Evam janantenavuso, bhikkhuna ‘amakkhi bhavissami apalasi’ti cittam uppadetabbam.
mn15:6.38: ‘Yo khvayam puggalo issuki macchari, ayam me puggalo appiyo amanapo;
mn15:6.39: ahanceva kho panassam issuki macchari, ahampassam paresam appiyo amanapo’ti.
mn15:6.40: Evam janantenavuso, bhikkhuna ‘anissuki bhavissami amacchari’ti cittam uppadetabbam.
mn15:6.41: ‘Yo khvayam puggalo satho mayavi, ayam me puggalo appiyo amanapo;
mn15:6.42: ahanceva kho panassam satho mayavi, ahampassam paresam appiyo amanapo’ti.
mn15:6.43: Evam janantenavuso, bhikkhuna ‘asatho bhavissami amayavi’ti cittam uppadetabbam.
mn15:6.44: ‘Yo khvayam puggalo thaddho atimani, ayam me puggalo appiyo amanapo;
mn15:6.45: ahanceva kho panassam thaddho atimani, ahampassam paresam appiyo amanapo’ti.
mn15:6.46: Evam janantenavuso, bhikkhuna ‘atthaddho bhavissami anatimani’ti cittam uppadetabbam.
mn15:6.47: ‘Yo khvayam puggalo sanditthiparamasi adhanaggahi duppatinissaggi, ayam me puggalo appiyo amanapo;
mn15:6.48: ahanceva kho panassam sanditthiparamasi adhanaggahi duppatinissaggi, ahampassam paresam appiyo amanapo’ti.
mn15:6.49: Evam janantenavuso, bhikkhuna ‘asanditthiparamasi bhavissami anadhanaggahi suppatinissaggi’ti cittam uppadetabbam.

mn15:7.85: Sace panavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamano evam janati:
mn15:7.86: ‘atthaddho khomhi anatimani’ti, tenavuso, bhikkhuna teneva pitipamojjena vihatabbam ahorattanusikkhina kusalesu dhammesu.
mn15:7.87: Puna caparam, avuso, bhikkhuna attanava attanam evam paccavekkhitabbam:
mn15:7.89: Sace, avuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamano evam janati:
mn15:7.90: ‘sanditthiparamasi khomhi adhanaggahi duppatinissaggi’ti, tenavuso, bhikkhuna tesamyeva papakanam akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya vayamitabbam.
mn15:7.91: Sace panavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamano evam janati:
mn15:7.92: ‘asanditthiparamasi khomhi anadhanaggahi suppatinissaggi’ti, tenavuso, bhikkhuna teneva pitipamojjena vihatabbam ahorattanusikkhina kusalesu dhammesu.
mn15:8.1: Sace, avuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamano sabbepime papake akusale dhamme appahine attani samanupassati, tenavuso, bhikkhuna sabbesamyeva imesam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya vayamitabbam.
mn15:8.2: Sace panavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamano sabbepime papake akusale dhamme pahine attani samanupassati, tenavuso, bhikkhuna teneva pitipamojjena vihatabbam, ahorattanusikkhina kusalesu dhammesu.
mn15:8.3: Seyyathapi, avuso, itthi va puriso va, daharo yuva mandanajatiko, adase va parisuddhe pariyodate, acche va udakapatte, sakam mukhanimittam paccavekkhamano, sace tattha passati rajam va anganam va, tasseva rajassa va anganassa va pahanaya vayamati;
mn15:8.4: no ce tattha passati rajam va anganam va, teneva attamano hoti:
mn15:8.6: Evameva kho, avuso, sace bhikkhu paccavekkhamano sabbepime papake akusale dhamme appahine attani samanupassati, tenavuso, bhikkhuna sabbesamyeva imesam papakanam akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya vayamitabbam.
mn15:8.7: Sace panavuso, bhikkhu paccavekkhamano sabbepime papake akusale dhamme pahine attani samanupassati, tenavuso, bhikkhuna teneva pitipamojjena vihatabbam, ahorattanusikkhina kusalesu dhammesu”ti.
mn15:8.9: Attamana te bhikkhu ayasmato mahamoggallanassa bhasitam abhinandunti.
